Events that occurred on 8 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 254a.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 294.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to C.N. Manlove.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to David L. Sands.
1968 - The fourth day of filming J.R.R. Tolkien for the documentary Tolkien in Oxford.
2001 - A Tolkien Treasury (miniature edition) is released.
2008 - "C.S. Lewis, the Inklings, and the Call to Christian Community" conference, featuring Tom Shippey.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
Full moon [1]
